0x3B6A13E1.name: GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_COLLECTION_PROP_DRAWABLE_VARIATIONS

params.name: anchorPoint
params.description: One of the anchor points from [SET_PED_PROP_INDEX](#\_0x93376B65A266EB5F)

params.name: collection
params.description: Name of the collection. Empty string for the base game collection. See [GET_PED_COLLECTION_NAME](#\_0xFED5D83A) in order to list all available collections.

0x3B6A13E1.description: An analogue of [GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_PROP_DRAWABLE_VARIATIONS](#\_0x5FAF9754E789FB47) that returns number of prop variations inside a single collection instead of the total number across all collections.
0x3B6A13E1.resultsDescription: Number of props available in the given collection. Returns 0 if ped or collection does not exist.
